description: This file defines a REST controller for managing notes in a web application. It provides CRUD operations with support for pagination, sorting, and searching, utilizing Spring Boot's annotations and mechanisms.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST controller providing CRUD endpoints for notes, including search, pagination, and sorting.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the request data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes, optionally filtered by search query and sorted.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its identifier.

methods.name: parseSort
methods.description: Utility method to parse the sort parameter into a Sort object.
